name: Apothekitty (Jorbyte, Bradgnar, Cassidy, UchiMama, Everett, Myrk)
name_original: Apothekitty (Jorbyte, Bradgnar, Cassidy, UchiMama, Everett, Myrk)
description:
This town's full of sick kitties!

Controls

Use the mouse to click and drag ingredients into the cauldron. Click the Recipes tab to see the different recipes you can make! Read each kitty's dialogue to figure out what potion will help them.
